course.subject: SBMT
course.name: ESG in Finance in Hong Kong
course.description: This course aims to develop studentsâ€™ comprehensive knowledge, skills and understanding ESG, sustainable finance, and ESG reporting. Particular focuses will be placed on the impact of ESG and sustainable finance on listed companies in Hong Kong. This course comprises both formal lectures and guest lectures to allow students to develop solid ESG and green finance knowledge, as well as understand the latest market and regulatory developments in Hong Kong.
